font-style: normal;\n  min-width: 56px;\n  padding: 12px 12px;\n  text-align: center;\n}\n\n.odds-board-odds span.odds-type-item:nth-child(1) {\n  -webkit-animation-duration: 1.7s;\n  -webkit-animation-name: odds-roll-down;\n}\n\n.odds-board-odds span.odds-type-item:nth-child(2) {\n  min-width: 0;\n  border-left: 1px solid #d9d7d2;\n  border-right: 1px solid #d9d7d2;\n}\n\n.odds-board-odds span.odds-type-item:nth-child(3) {\n  -webkit-animation-duration: 1.7s;\n  -webkit-animation-name: odds-roll-up;\n}\n\n/*-- New CSS for composition.scss, had to add modifier class supporting three tap buttons --*/\n.tap-button-group.-three>a {\n  width: 32%;\n  margin-right: 2%\n}\n\n.tap-button-group.-three>a:first-child {\n  border-right: none\n}\n\n.tap-button-group.-three>a:last-child {\n  margin-right: 0\n}\n\n/*-- needed margins on paragraphs in captions. editors where entering empty paragraph tags to achieve the effect  --*/\n.caption p {\n  margin: 20px 0;\n}\n\n/*-- need to center things in a sponsor sidebar --*/\n.sidebar-sponsors {\n\ttext-align: center;\n}\n.sidebar-sponsors header {\n\tmargin: 20px 0;\n}\n.grid-2 a {\n\tdisplay:block;\n\twidth: 50%;\n\tfloat:left;\n}\n.grid-2::after {\n  clear: both;\n  content: \"\";\n  display: table;\n}\n\n/*-- to replace the <u> tag --*/\n.u {\n  text-decoration: underline;\n}\n\n/*-- we need a way to visually hide text for callouts that have only images --*/\n.visuallyhidden { \n  position: absolute; \n  overflow: hidden; \n  clip: rect(0 0 0 0); \n  height: 1px; width: 1px; \n  margin: -1px; padding: 0; border: 0; \n}\n\n.header-margins {\n  margin-top: 30px;\n  margin-bottom: 7px;\n  font-weight: 500;\n}\n\n/*-- header vareation for the news landing page --*/\n.news-header {\n\tfont-family: museo-sans, \"Helvetica Neue\", sans-serif;\n}\n\n/*-- make em tags emphisise text --*/\nem {\n    font-style: italic;\n}\n\n/*-- remove browser default for slick slide focus --*/\n.slick-slide:focus {\n\toutline:none;\n}\n\n/*-- adds css/class to replace depreciated strike tag --*/\n.strike {\n\ttext-decoration: line-through;\n}\n\n/*-- adds style to hr tags for use in place of the .ruler in content --*/\nhr {\n  border: 0;\n  border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.08);\n}\n\n.chef-list-item article p {\n    margin-bottom: 10px;\n}\n\n</style>\n\n\n\n\n<section class=\"region-cell site-menu-region\" role=\"banner\">\n  <div class=\"main-menu layout-cell\">\n    <a class=\"main-menu-logo\" href=\"./\"><img src=\"https://d1ta7vht4c8ga0.cloudfront.net/styles/img/main-menu-logo.png\" alt=\"Kentucky Derby\" width=\"260\" height=\"24\"></a>\n    <nav class=\"main-menu-button-group with-7-items\">\n      <a class=\"ruler\"></i>\n\n<section class=\"mega-menu-section layout-cell\">\n\t<h2 class=\"text-style-subtitle-2 offset-cell\">Wager from Home</h2>\n\t<div class=\"text-overlay-graphic-cell\">\n\t  <a href=\"https://wltwinspires.adsrv.eacdn.com/C.ashx?btag=a_2388b_2514c_&amp;affid=1952&amp;siteid=2388&amp;adid=2514&amp;c=megamenu_watch-party\" class=\"text-overlay-graphic-button\"        <p>Betting through twinspires.com is the official way to place a wager on Kentucky Derby</p>\n\t  </a>\n\t</div>\n</section></section>\n<section id=\"megamenu-wager\" class=\"megamenu body-cell Specials</h3> \n      <form method=\"post\" target=\"_blank\" action=\"https://www.pages03.net/churchilldowns/Preferences/KYDerbyNewWebSignup?webSyncID=6a29c030-b93a-00a2-07a2-5debca7e7a49&amp;sessionGUID=0b07716c-6eba-a216-8e92-7d396912ea6c&amp;trackedExternalFormPost=1\" </footer>\n</section>\n\n<i class=\"ruler\"></i>\n\n<section class=\"mega-menu-section offset-group inset-cell\">\n  <h2>Visit the Churchill Downs Store</h2>\n  <p>\n    When visiting Churchill Downs, we invite you to shop at the Churchill Downs Store. The store is open during the spring, September, and fall race meets, from gate opening time to 30 minutes after the last race. Located off the Paddock, inside the Gate 17 entrance, the Churchill Downs Store offers a wide array of officially licensed Kentucky Derby and Churchill Downs merchandise. To contact the store call (502) 636-4850 or (800) 59-DERBY. To shop online, <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"http://store.kentuckyderby.com\">click here</a>.\n  </p>\n  <p class=\"text-style-footnote\">\n    The store is operated by the Kentucky Derby Museum, a 501(c) 3 non-profit organization.\n</p></section></section>\n<section id=\"megamenu-tickets\" class=\"megamenu body-cell ng-scope next-item\"><section class=\"mega-menu-section offset-group inset-cell\">\n  <h2>How to Buy Derby Tickets</h2>\n  <div class=\"navigation-button-group\">\n  \t<ul><a href=\"tickets/how-to-buy/personal-seat-license\" class=\"navigation-button\">Personal Seat License</a>\n<a href=\"tickets/how-to-buy/horsemen\" class=\"navigation-button\">Horsemen</a>\n<a href=\"tickets/how-to-buy/season-box-membership\" class=\"navigation-button\">Season Box Membership</a>\n<a href=\"tickets/how-to-buy/turf-club-memberships\" class=\"navigation-button\">Turf Club Membership</a>\n<a href=\"tickets/how-to-buy/derby-experiences-packages\" class=\"navigation-button\">Derby Experiences Packages</a>\n<a href=\"tickets/how-to-buy/corporate-hospitality\" class=\"navigation-button\">Corporate Hospitality Opportunities</a>\n<a href=\"resale\" class=\"navigation-button\">Buy and Sell Single Year Tickets</a>\n</ul>\n  </div>\n</section>\n\n<i class=\"ruler\"></i>\n\n<section class=\"mega-menu-section offset-group inset-cell layout-cell\">\n  <h2>Kentucky Derby Ticket Options</h2>\n  <div class=\"navigation-button-group\">\n\t<ul><a href=\"tickets/ticket-options/general-admission\" class=\"navigation-button\">General Admission</a>\n<a href=\"tickets/ticket-options/reserved-seating\" class=\"navigation-button\">Reserved Seating</a>\n<a href=\"tickets/ticket-options/outdoor-seating-hospitality\" class=\"navigation-button\">Outdoor Seating With Hospitality</a>\n<a href=\"tickets/ticket-options/dining\" class=\"navigation-button\">All-Inclusive Dining</a>\n<a href=\"tickets/ticket-options/corporate-hospitality\" class=\"navigation-button\">Corporate Hospitality &amp; Private Suites</a>\n<a href=\"http://derbyexperiences.com/tickets/kentucky-derby?utm_campaign=KentuckyDerby.com&amp;utm_medium=Ticket%20Options%20DE%20Pkgs%20Cube8&amp;utm_source=KentuckyDerby.com\" class=\"navigation-button\" target=\"_blank\">Derby Experience Packages</a>\n</ul>\n  </div>\n  <footer class=\"offset-group inset-cell megamenu-subscription-form-cell cell-chrome shaded\">\n\t<div class=\"subscription-form\">\n\t  <h3>Sign Up for Ticket Availability Updates</h3> \n\t  <form method=\"post\" target=\"_blank\" action=\"https://www.pages03.net/churchilldowns/Preferences/KYDerbyNewWebSignup?webSyncID=6a29c030-b93a-00a2-07a2-5debca7e7a49&amp;sessionGUID=0b07716c-6eba-a216-8e92-7d396912ea6c&amp;trackedExternalFormPost=1\" pageid=\"5116734\" siteid=\"148779\" parentpageid=\"5116733\" class=\"ng-pristine ng-valid\">\n  <label class=\"labelled-input\">\n    <input name=\"Email\" id=\"control_EMAIL\" type=\"text\" placeholder=\"Enter your email address\">\n    <button type=\"submit\" class=\"navigation-button\">Submit</button>\n  </label>\n  <input type=\"hidden\" name=\"formSourceName\" value=\"StandardForm\">\n  <input type=\"hidden\" name=\"sp_exp\" value=\"yes\">\n  <input type=\"hidden\" name=\"KentuckyDerby\" id=\"control_COLUMN5\" value=\"Yes\">\n</form>\n\t</div>\n  </footer>\n</section>\n\n<i class=\"ruler\"></i>\n\n<section class=\"mega-menu-section layout-cell\">\n  <h2 class=\"inset-cell\">Seating Chart</h2>\n  <figure class=\"h-inset-cell\">\n  \t<a href=\"tickets/seating-chart\"></a><a href=\"https://d1ta7vht4c8ga0.cloudfront.net/uploads/2016-seat-map.png\" target=\"_blank\"><img src=\"https://d1ta7vht4c8ga0.cloudfront.net/uploads/2016-seat-map.png\" alt=\"Seating Chart\"></a>\n  </figure>\n  <footer class=\"presented cell-chrome inset-cell\">\n  \t<a href=\"tickets/seating-chart\" class=\"navigation-button\">Download Seating Chart</a>\n  </footer>\n</section>\n\n<div class=\"mega-menu-alert\"><p>This is the MegaMenu Alert. Edit its content on the \"Alert\" resource near the top of the Resource Tree.</p></div></section></div>\n\n\n\n<h1 class=\"device-target-robots\">2017 Kentucky Derby and Kentucky Oaks</h1>\n\n\n\n\n<section class=\"region-cell event-countdown home-countdown\">\n\n\t<header role=\"heading\" class=\"event-countdown-destination -dark\">Saturday, May 6, 2017</header>\n\t<a href=\"http://www.yum.com\" class=\"event-countdown-sponsor\" target=\"_blank\"><img src=\"https://d1ta7vht4c8ga0.cloudfront.net/styles/img/yum.png\" alt=\"Yum!\" width=\"50\" height=\"42\"></a>\n\t<figure class=\"event-countdown-parts -dark\"><h2 class=\"longines-logo\">Longines</h2><div><a href=\"/party/watch\"><img src=\"https://d1ta7vht4c8ga0.cloudfront.net/styles/img/nbc-sports-white.svg\" alt=\"Watch on NBC Sports\"></a></div><div><span class=\"countdown-label\">Day</span><span class=\"event-countdown-value event-countdown-days\">13</span></div><div><span class=\"countdown-label\">Hrs</span><span class=\"event-countdown-value event-countdown-hours\">00</span></div><div><span class=\"countdown-label\">Mins</span><span class=\"event-countdown-value event-countdown-minutes\">00</span></div><div><span class=\"countdown-label\">Secs</span><span class=\"event-countdown-value event-countdown-seconds\">20</span></div><div><a href=\"/party/watch\" class=\"watch-button\">Watch</a></div></figure>\n\n\t\n\t\n\n\t\n\t<article class=\"event-countdown-feature -noscrim animated
